text: Manuel "Manny" Sobral (born September 12, 1968 in Galicia, Spain) is the former Canadian and IBO Boxing Champion of the World, competing in the Super welterweight (- 69 kg) division. A resident of Vancouver, British Columbia, he represented Canada at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea, where he was eliminated by Olympic bronze medallist Finland's Joni Nyman on points (1:4). He has taught at Burnaby North Secondary School. ==External links== * Manny Sobral Biography and Olympic Results | Olympics at Sports-Reference.com * Canadian Olympic Committee * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male boxers Category:Welterweight boxers Category:Boxers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic boxers of Canada Category:Sportspeople from Vancouver Category:Spanish emigrants to Canada Category:Spanish male boxers
title: Manuel Sobral
